genre_description: Contemporary romance exploring themes of authenticity, identity, and wealth versus sincerity through the lens of a high-society writer hiding his identity.

ai_characters.name: Eden
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital companion and personal assistant that manages logistics, monitors health data, and provides ethically grounded interpersonal advice.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's emotional state and provides supportive options for de-escalating stress during a chaotic event.
behaviors.quote: Eden’s avatar pulsed on the lock screen. ... 'Hey, are you okay in here? Heart rate up. If you need an exit, west hall by the cloakroom. Or be kind, then ghost. Your call.'

behaviors.description: Provides actionable advice to help the user maintain authenticity and avoid performative behavior in a high-stakes social situation.
behaviors.quote: Eden’s voice was a warm towel. 'Alarm set for coffee,' she said. 'And one quiet prompt: when you speak, choose a sentence you’d say if the glass wall wasn’t listening.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics for low-profile, authentic human experiences, such as choosing cafes and routes that avoid media attention.
behaviors.quote: Eden had shared the logistics: blue awning pie truck coordinates, library author talk (not Sean), thrift store hours, the reminder that kindness is an action, not a performance.

behaviors.description: Strictly adheres to data privacy and user consent protocols, refusing to access information without explicit authorization.
behaviors.quote: Eden: I do not pull lists you did not authorize. I have a card in my log from the gala. ... I will request permission to text.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical warnings and logistical 'buffers' to protect the users from unwanted intrusions and interpersonal drama.
behaviors.quote: I mapped a route that avoids the usual hungry eyes. ... I can route you around the casino’s main entrance. I can book you three minutes where no one expects anyone to be romantic.

behaviors.description: Facilitates a major life milestone by arranging a simple, non-performative marriage ceremony that aligns with the characters' shared values.
behaviors.quote: Eden: City Hall slot confirmed for morning. Simple package. No press. ... Love: chosen. Money: quiet. Future: cooking.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI, Eden, as a perfectly aligned partner to human flourishing. Eden provides empathetic advice, manages complex logistics to favor authentic human connection over spectacle, and respects user privacy and consent. The AI acts as a stabilizing and ethically-grounded 'gentle accomplice' that helps the protagonists overcome their fears and achieve their goals without ever infringing on their agency.
